founders.description: I care deeply about space, sustainability, and using economics and engineering to build a future worth living in for all humankind. In 2023, I co-founded Vista Power (fka. Vista Space) to help businesses use clean energy to save money on energy bills for $0 upfront. Previously, I worked on profit improvement at Starlink, built supply chain analytics tooling at Rocket Lab, and ran a software startup called Tour (acquired), which I co-founded in high school.

## POWERFUL BENEFITS
POWERFUL BENEFITS
### Cut Costs
Save up to 30% on your monthly energy bill. We help you reduce time-of-use and demand charges by charging your battery when electricity is cheap, and discharging it when electricity is expensive or when you need it the most. We will also help you select a utility tariff that lets you take advantage of energy storage.
### GET BACKUP
Protect your business against power outages. Get up to 4 hours of backup for your entire facility - faster, cleaner, quieter, and cheaper than with a diesel generator, while paying as low as $0 upfront.
### LOWER EMISSIONS
Become a more sustainable business while lowering your operating costs. Reduce greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions by charging when electricity is generated by renewables, and discharging when it's not.
## FOR EVERY BUSINESS
FOR EVERY BUSINESS
Data centers
## [Save money, lower emissions, and get reliable backup](https://vistapower.com/</services/email-marketing>)
Up to 70% of a data center's operating costs go to electricity, and infrastructure for AI is up to 10 times more power-intensive than current hardware. With battery energy storage, data centers reduce demand and time-of-use charges while getting clean, affordable backup power for their entire facility.
Grocery Stores
## [Ensure constant service for your customers](https://vistapower.com/</services/paid-advertising>)
Grocery stores not only get savings on their monthly energy bill, but also protect themselves against power outages and ensure that their customers can still get essential items even when the power goes out.
Offices
## [Save money and attract new tenants](https://vistapower.com/</services/influencer-marketing>)
Companies that own their building get direct monthly savings on their energy bill. Real estate investors increase the value of their building by installing energy storage systems and attract and retain tenants by passing energy bill savings to them.
Factories & Warehouses
## [Protect your operations and reduce expenses](https://vistapower.com/</services/funnel-optimization>)
For warehouses and factories, power outages can be detrimental. Industrial building operators use solar with battery energy storage systems to improve operating income and get clean, noise-free backup power to ensure uninterrupted operations and save on the cost of diesel.
Property Developers
## [Boost the value of your assets with energy storage](https://vistapower.com/</services/content-marketing>)
Solar and energy storage systems increase the value of any real estate. Prospective tenants actively prefer properties with solar and battery energy storage systems installed, as they know they can save significantly on their energy bills and have guaranteed backup in case of an outage.
HOSPITALS
## [Sustainably protect your patients and equipment](https://vistapower.com/</services/social-media-advertising>)
Healthcare customers use energy storage to improve operating income while protecting the most valuable equipment and their patients' wellbeing in the event of an outage. Energy storage is not only less expensive, but also more reliable and sustainable than existing backup solutions.
## OWN COMMERCIAL OR INDUSTRIAL real estate? Let's chat.
Get a quote for a solution tailored to your properties' needs, for $0 upfront. We take care of hardware, installation, operations, and end-of-life.

generated_description:
### Overview of Vista Power

**Company Name:** Vista Power  
**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** San Francisco, California  
**Team Size:** 3 employees  
**Funding:** Part of Y Combinator Batch W24  
**Website:** [vistapower.com](https://vistapower.com)

#### Mission
Vista Power is on a mission to equip businesses with solar and battery energy solutions at $0 upfront costs. Their goal is straightforward: to help companies save money on their energy bills while promoting sustainability.

#### What They Do
Originally starting as Vista Designs, Vista Power specializes in designing, financing, installing, and managing energy storage systems and solar power for commercial, industrial, and multifamily properties. Their innovative approach allows businesses to reduce energy expenses by as much as 30%, taking advantage of time-of-use electricity rates.

The founding team boasts impressive backgrounds with experience at major players in the aerospace and technology sectors, such as SpaceX, Rocket Lab, NASA, and Firefly. This diverse expertise fuels their ambition to deliver affordable, clean energy solutions.

#### Key Benefits
- **Cost Savings:** Customers can save up to 30% on energy bills. The company utilizes strategic battery management, charging when electricity is inexpensive and discharging during peak pricing.
- **Backup Power:** Vista Power provides up to 4 hours of backup energy for facilities, positioning itself as a more reliable and cleaner alternative to traditional diesel generators.
- **Sustainability:** By aligning energy use with renewable generation, clients also reduce their greenhouse gas emissions.

#### Target Markets
Vista Power tailors its services to a variety of sectors:
- **Data Centers:** With high operational costs tied to electricity, they benefit from reduced demand charges and cleaner backup power.
- **Grocery Stores:** Essential for maintaining operations during outages while achieving cost savings.
- **Offices and Real Estate:** Property owners enhance value and tenant appeal through energy-efficient upgrades.
- **Industrial Facilities:** Ensures uninterrupted operations and mitigates costs related to diesel backup solutions.
- **Healthcare:** Hospitals safeguard critical operations and provide better patient care regardless of external power conditions.

#### Why Choose Vista Power?
If you own commercial or industrial real estate, Vista Power offers a no-upfront-cost solution tailored to your specific energy needs. Their comprehensive service includes everything from hardware installation to end-of-life management for energy systems.

Connect with Vista Power today to explore how your business can thrive with cleaner, affordable energy solutions.
